website_summaries.verdict: The Belkin tablet case provides a firm fit and basic protection, but its design conforms better to midsize tablets than 7-inchers.
pros: The Belkin Universal Cover for 7- to 8-inch tablets is lightweight with a sturdy build and comfortable feel
It securely fastens small and midsize slates, can be used as a stand, and features a flap on the rear for easy camera access
cons: The size works better for tablets larger than 7 inches and smudges on the exterior can be difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Great case if you don't plan on dropping the it on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this case at Radio Shack and decided to order from Amazon. I use the case with my Lenovo 10" tab. Liked it because of the secure fitting of clips and the fold back corner for picture taking. Though this case is flimsy when it comes to drops and oopsies. Though even my 4 year old can handle it and figure out the kickstand fold, dogear corner, and hidden magnets. Good for indoor use, but would recommend something more secure for outdoor and on the go lifestyles.
customer_reviews.author: tshinn777

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case and much better $$ than Verizon store. Also better selection of colors
customer_reviews.author: mckinnk

customer_reviews.title: Protects tablet but case side bar breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover to replace one exactly like it when the side bar that keeps the tablet from slipping out broke on our first one. The broken one was no longer usable because the tablet would not stay in place and we lost the broken piece. The side bar on the new case also developed a break in the same place but we managed to repair it with glue. It is very difficult to find a cover that protects the tablet and allows the camera to be used without removing it from the case which is why we were willing to repair the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Hated it
customer_reviews.text: Item did not close completely/flat. Poorly constructed. Had a nasty looking stain on the front cover that looked like some sort of oily residue. It couldn't be wiped off. Returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, not heavy duty protection, basic case.
customer_reviews.text: This was chosen for a Google Nexus 7 inch tablet. + I really like the way the case expands and adjust to fit tablet securely. + Attractive case. + Allows you to prop the tablet up on a flat surface. + Reasonably priced for item. I work in a store that sells a variety of similar products and this is about the going price for tablet covers. ($40) + Provides basic protection, especially if you're carrying your tablet, or putting it in a bag with other items. - It's not a great feel for holding your tablet and actually working with it Better for using on a surface. The sides of the case restrict your reach.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of Belkin products & this doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical of the "Universal" claim, but there is an interior tab and elastic system that works beautifully provided you get the right size case for your tablet. Very secure, easy to set up so the tablet is standing, it's quiet (unlike some tablet cases!) and it's very streamlined. Sure, maybe a few more color options would be nice, but that's not really a big deal. This is a great product for the price. I would say maybe an elastic to wrap around the whole thing would be prudent (you know, like Moleskines have)... because this one didn't come with one and it keeps flapping open. Hence the 4-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: runningoutofideas

customer_reviews.title: too large for my purse
customer_reviews.text: The Belkin adjustible tablet cover has pros and cons. PROS: *easy to put on tablet *fits securely *allows for camera use *sits up at a higher viewing angle or a lower typing angle CONS: *folding the tablet cover to stand up leaves the cover wavy when closed *the fold-back corner for the camera is a bit awkward *sometimes the folded cover/stand gives way when you are typing *this cover is larger than my samsung galaxy 3 *it doesn't fit in my purse I used it for a week, then switched back to a case made for my actual tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: unworkable
customer_reviews.text: The universal quality is an asset if not for poor design. It would be great to be able to switch from new to old generation devices. Sometimes it is hard to find cases for older devices. However this thing has two pull out straps which hold your device against a stationary lip. The lip is just too thin for many devices to be considered universal. Then there is the freakishly large front flap. This thing moots the portability of a seven inch device. You cannot put it in your pocket anymore. I have no use for this case.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Revised...Broke all by itself... poor design of clip.
customer_reviews.text: Like the case well. The camera flap is somewhat awkward, but with stronger magnets it would be fine. Well made. REVISED: 2 months after I bought this case I noticed the plastic clip on the right edge broke. The clip on the edge has most of the plastic cut from the middle and the ends are WEAK. Tried to save a penny per thousand and ruined the product. And it wasn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JayConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for 7" tablets
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7" Samsung tablet and this case is a terrible fit for it. I realize it is made for both 7" and 8" tablets. But that means there is a fair amount of wasted space around all edges of the tablet. That makes it feel flimsy and harder to hold. Also because it is a generic one-size-fits-some case, it doesn't work with the camera because is it partially blocked, even when the corner tab is folded down. Do yourself a favor and buy a case specifically designed for whatever tablet you have.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Good versatile case
customer_reviews.text: This is a good enough case if you have a non-standard (i.e.: non famous) tablet, and want something better than very cheap ones. I tried it with my, which is also little bit quirky, and it fit well. However the adjustable stand (tri-fold page), does not always stick properly. Also it is not heavy duty, so while it will protect from basic falls, do not expect too much. Still the case is good enough, and looks stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Sukru Tikves

customer_reviews.title: Works nice, could fit a little better
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put the little lady's 7" Coby tablet in it. Fits ok after some initial wrangling. The Coby seems to be a little too thick to fit under the main tab that holds it in the case at the top. But it does fit and has stayed in there. Protects well, and allows for angled viewing and use. Not a bad deal, and doesn't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Mike J

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Tablet Cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet cover. It fits securely and is adjustable. The back folds down to access the camera. It folds to stand the tablet up. It's lightweight and unencumbersome but is protective for the tablet. I highly recommend this for anyone who ones a 7" or 8" tablet. LOVE mine!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Dowdle

customer_reviews.title: iPad case
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase, is doing what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bucher

product_meta.title: Belkin Universal Case and Cover for iPad mini (All Versions), Galaxy Tab 3 (7'' and 8''), Galaxy Tab 2 (7''), Galaxy Note 8.0, Kindle HD Fire 7'', Nexus 7'', and Other 7-Inch and 8-Inch Tablet (Charcoal)
product_meta.description: Color:CharcoalThe Belkin 7"-8" Universal Folio protects your device on the go
feature_bullets: Cover with protective corners securely holds 7- and 8-inch tablets
Durable polyurethane exterior helps protect tablet from damage
Folds into tablet stand with two angles for viewing or typing
Camera-friendly design lets you take photos with cover on

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars62 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
